### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* #18865 (gui: Refactor WalletFrame to extend QStackView by promag)

If you consider this pull request important, please a
Rebased after #17937 and #18036 have been merged.

Rebased 809fd3a6e4952671633a5c193fb5fa0f41837b29 -> 7d7cd84351b6c1637ec40f7546c1aaa16bb55199 ([pr17966.04](https://github.com/hebasto/bitcoin/commits/pr17966.04) -> [pr17966.05](https://github.com/hebasto/bitcoin/commits/pr17966.05)) due to the conflict with #16432.
There's a Concept ACK, however no subsequent review after ~6 months and this is purely a gui/qt refactor. I'm going to suggest moving this over to https://github.com/bitcoin-core/gui.
